name: Non-Standard SQL Table Name must be empty for a Record View (PeopleSoft)
description: Identify each record with a defined Non-Standard SQL Table Name
output: This report lists all the Record Views with the property not empty
rationale: For a new record view, don't use the "Non Standard SQL Table Name' property to specify the view name. It will override the standard convention of prefixing PS_ to the record name
remediation: Delete the specific name. the impact of any change should be studied further because, the table name is probably referenced in some SQL and / or PeopleCode
alternativeName: Non-Standard SQL Table Name must be empty for a Record View (PeopleSoft)
